title: BARADED
author: BARADED
content: Physical rewardsAs a way to express my gratitude for those who contribute to my fundraising campaign, I am offering some rewards to my supporters.For those who donate a smaller amount, I will provide digital access to exclusive content, such as behind-the-scenes footage of my design process, sneak peeks of new collections, and personalized messages of appreciation.For those who donate a larger amount, I will offer physical rewards, such as limited edition pieces from my new Bitcoin collection, signed sketches of my designs, or even personalized garments made just for them.I truly appreciate any support that comes my way, and I am committed to ensuring that my supporters feel valued and appreciated. Thank you in advance for considering my fundraising campaign and for helping me achieve my dream of creating sustainable, genderless clothing with a unique twist.Sewing machine BITCOIN https://geyser.fund/project/sewingmachinebitcoin
